name: Heavy Gold (MarinoVuk)
description:
Theme: The Weight of One’s Crimes

You just found an old dungeon filled with heavy treasures. The gravity here is -27,52. Avoid robots that were protecting the dungeon for centuries and become the richest thief in galaxy.

Controls: 

Move in the direction of the mouse with W, you can sprint with SHIFT, you can jump with SPACE on your keyboard.

Credits:

Lead programmer: Alen Naumoski 

Programmer: Marino Vuk

Pixel artist: Anej Bradač Vranc
